title: TANUVAS Recruitment 2025 - Apply Offline for Young Professional -II Posts
description: The Tamil Nadu Veterinary and Animal Sciences University (TANUVAS) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 01 Young Professional -II Posts. Interested and eligible candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their B.E./B. Tech, M.E./M. Tech, M.Sc., can apply for the TANUVAS Recruitment 2025. The interested applicants can apply in offline mode. Here we have mentioned the education deta...
